## About
Hello world! I'm Luís Galete, a self-proclaimed digital craftsman, music enthusiast, anime connoisseur and coffee addict. I started coding because I wanted to turn my dumb ideas into reality, and that's what I'm currently focused on. There is still a long way to go, but you can check out what I have built so far in [my website](https://luisgalete.com.br/).

- ‍💻 **Working on:** Improving myself.
- 🧠 **Learning:** TypeScript.
- 🌎 **Living in:** Brazil.
- ❄️ **Favorite thing:** Drinking coffee on a cold day.
- 👾 **Favorite game:** Xenoblade Chronicles 3.
- 🍙 **Favorite anime:** Hyouka.
- 💬 **Languages:** Portuguese and English.
- 📫 **Contact:** Just send me a [message](https://yunger.dev/contact).
